General.Name: Chengdu Fusen Noble-House Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: Chengdu Fusen Noble-House Industrial Co.,Ltd. engages in the development, rental, and service of decorative building materials and home furnishing markets. It also operates as a decorative design and decoration company. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Chengdu, China.
General.Address: No. 189, Tianhe West Second Street, Chengdu, China, 610041

2.Name: Mr. Fengshu  Zhang
2.Title: Deputy Gen. Mang. and Sec. of the Board of Directors
